description:
A programming font, designed with functionality in mind, and with some wibbly-wobbly handwriting-like fuzziness that makes it unassumingly cool.

The font includes a bold version, with the same metrics as the regular one. Both versions include the same ranges of characters : latin letters, some accented glyphs (quite a lot), some greek letters, some arrows.

![Sample](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/belluzj/fantasque-sans@ff9be0c44e744c7916316653c21e03b800e5fb54/Specimen/Specimen.png)
author: Jany Belluz
